name: Stars Mission
description:
This game was with my bother for the WGJ#139

The theme is follower so we thought of a space-shooter where you acquire spells that follows you by destroying entities.

Unfortunatly we could only work on it for 4 days but we are happy of how it turned out.

Controls:

Gamepad: Left Stick to move and A to shoot

Keyboard: Arrow keys to move and Space our LMouse to shoot

We recommand the usage of the gamepad

We would enjoy your feedbacks and advise on what we should improve !

  • Player model : https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-space-ship-587941c9c11742c6b82dfb99e7b2...
  • Incantation sprites: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BeKvLRmnsyE
  • Musics: https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles

Everything else was made by us using the UnityEngine
